flawed_nl_solution:
He takes pictures for 3*365=<<3*365=1095>>1095 days
So he takes 10*1095=<<10*1095=19050>>19050 pictures
That means he needs 19050/50=<<19050/50=381>>381 memory cards
So he spends 381*60=$<<381*60=22860>>22860 on memory cards
#### 22860

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10950, not 19050. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
